edge: Initially scheduled to release on July 15, 2011, but was delayed and set for August 12, 2011. Later announced for a Diwali release on October 26, 2011, leading to a clash with Shahrukh Khan's production Ra.One. Eventually released on October 6, 2011.
Clashed with Shahrukh Khan's production Ra.One during the Diwali release on October 26, 2011.
